name: Fall Of Tenebris
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is my 2D Mobile Unity Game group project made for my Game Design & Development Studio 2 called "Fall Of Tenebris".  It is a 2D Side-scrolling Platformer action pandemic game for SGGA.

Game Made By: 

Haoting(Lead, Programmer), Hamzah(Me, Lead Programmer), Bryan(Programmer), Russell Teo(Lead Artist), Man Wen(Artist), Elsie(Artist)

Game's Story Description:

The day Humanity received a grim reminder that the human race was ever such vulnerable and weak creatures. The time when an unknown outbreak panic alarms and a deadly virus that were about to consume them all. Play either Raul or Eyka in this set forth adventure

Controls:

To Move: Joystick

To Attack: Attack Button

To Jump: Jump Button

To Swap: Swap Button

Pause: Pause Button
